dashed.description: Whether it is a dotted line

orientation.description: The position of the dividing line header

orientationMargin.description: The distance between the title and the nearest left/right border, with the dividing line removed, and the 'orientation' must be 'left' or right
orientationMargin.description_zh: 标题和最近 left/right 边框之间的距离，去除了分割线，同时 `orientation` 必须为 `left` 或 right

plain.description: Whether the text is displayed in a normal body style
plain.description_zh: 文字是否显示为普通正文样式
